long_description: Updated with lighter weight and enhanced comfort, the The Osprey Talon 22 Pack excels for your done-in-a-day pursuits. It's designed to accommodate a multitude of outdoor activities. Lightweight Osprey AirScape(TM) back panel features molded foam ridges with air channels covered in airy mesh. Mesh-lined, perforated shoulder straps and hipbelt save weight and enhance breathability. Panel-loading main compartment holds lunch, an extra layer of clothes and tools. The Osprey Talon 22 Pack accommodates a variety of back lengths with an adjustable torso: just rip it, adjust it and stick it. Front stretch pocket is ideal for stashing jacket, helmet, book or other often-used gear. Zippered stretch mesh pockets on hipbelt are large enough for your compact digital camera in one and snacks in the other. Twin stretch pockets on shoulder straps are sized to fit a cell phone, GPS or to just stash the end of your hydration tube. Hydration compartment on the Osprey Talon 22 Pack is accessible from the exterior between the torso adjustment and pack compartment (reservoir sold separately).
short_description: Updated with lighter weight and enhanced comfort, the The Osprey Talon 22 Pack excels for your done-in-a-day pursuits. It's designed to accommodate a multitude of outdoor activities.
